title: Buzz (Fifteen album)
text:
Buzz is the third studio album by California punk band <a href="Fifteen%20%28band%29">Fifteen</a>. The album was released on CD, LP, and cassette by the now-defunct label Grass Records, in 1994. It was re-released on CD by Grass Records on August 27, 1996, then re-released again on CD by <a href="Plan-It-X%20Records">Plan-It-X Records</a> on November 14, 2006. It is considered by many to be the best album by the band, including <a href="Brendan%20Kelly%20%28musician%29">Brendan Kelly</a> of <a href="The%20Lawrence%20Arms">The Lawrence Arms</a>.
Personnel.
Production
